pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces member of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following appointment:

The Honourable Marie Deschamps, C.C. becomes a member of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency (NSIRA), effective September 30, 2019.

With full and independent authority, the NSIRA works to ensure that Canadaâ€™s national security agencies are complying with the law and that their actions are reasonable and necessary.

Biographical Notes

  • Marie Deschamps, C.C.
